sense.def:
One's mother
je ženska v odnosu do nekoga, ki ga je rodila.

seg.quote: I always did everything my mother told me.

sense.def:
Izraz
to mother one's children
označuje, kako mati skrbi za svoje otroke in jih vzgaja.

seg.quote: Female monkeys who were badly mothered became bad mothers themselves.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
mothers someone
, z nekom ravna zelo naklonjeno in ga pogosto razvaja.

seg.quote: Both the other senior typists tended to mother me.
